{{ doc.company }}
{% if doc.docstatus == 0 %} {{ doc.status + " " + (doc.select_print_heading or _("Invoice")) }}
{% else %} {{ doc.select_print_heading or _("Invoice") }}
{% endif %}

{{ _("Receipt No") }}: {{ doc.name }}
{{ _("Date") }}: {{ doc.get_formatted("posting_date") }}
{{ _("Customer") }}: {{ doc.customer_name }}

{%- for item in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
{{ _("Item") }} {{ _("Qty") }} {{ _("Amount") }}
{{ item.item_code }} {%- if item.item_name != item.item_code -%}
{{ item.item_name }}{%- endif -%} 		{{ item.qty }}
@ {{ item.get_formatted("rate") }}		 {{ item.get_formatted("amount") }}

{{ _("Total Excl. Tax") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("net_total", doc) }} {{ _("Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("total", doc) }}

{{ doc.terms or "" }}

{{ _("Thank you, please visit again.") }}
name: POS Invoice

html:
{%- from "templates/print_formats/standard_macros.html" import add_header -%}
{%- if not doc.get("print_heading") and not doc.get("select_print_heading") and doc.set("select_print_heading", _("Payment Advice")) -%}{%- endif -%} {{ add_header(0, 1, doc, letter_head, no_letterhead) }} {%- for label, value in ( (_("Voucher Date"), frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.voucher_date)), (_("Reference / Cheque No."), doc.cheque_no), (_("Reference / Cheque Date"), frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.cheque_date)) ) -%}
{{ value }}
{%- endfor -%}

{{ _("This amount is in full / part settlement of the listed bills") }}:

{%- for label, value in ( (_("Amount"), "" + doc.get_formatted("total_amount") + "
" + (doc.total_amount_in_words or "") + "
"), (_("References"), doc.remark) ) -%}
{{ value }}
{%- endfor -%}
Prepared By
Authorised Signatory
Received Payment as Above
_____________
A/C Payee
_____________
{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.cheque_date) }}
{{ doc.pay_to_recd_from }}
{{ doc.total_amount_in_words }}
{{ doc.get_formatted("total_amount") }}
name: Cheque Printing Format

html:
{%- from "templates/print_formats/standard_macros.html" import add_header -%}
{%- if not doc.get("print_heading") and not doc.get("select_print_heading") and doc.set("select_print_heading", _("Credit Note")) -%}{%- endif -%} {{ add_header(0, 1, doc, letter_head, no_letterhead) }} {%- for label, value in ( (_("Credit To"), doc.pay_to_recd_from), (_("Date"), frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.voucher_date)), (_("Amount"), "" + doc.get_formatted("total_amount") + "
" + (doc.total_amount_in_words or "") + "
"), (_("Remarks"), doc.remark) ) -%}
{{ value }}
{%- endfor -%}

{{ _("For") }} {{ doc.company }},



{{ _("Authorized Signatory") }}
name: Credit Note

html:
{% set terms_exist = doc.terms and (doc.terms|striptags).strip() or "" %} {% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}

Date: {{ doc.offer_date }}

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to appoint you in the services of {{ doc.company }} on the terms and conditions detailed in this letter.

Your designation shall be {{ doc.designation }}.

{%- if doc.offer_terms -%} {%- for row in doc.offer_terms -%} {{ row.offer_term }}: {{ row.value }}
{%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%}
Please read the detailed terms as below. If you have any queries, feel free to get in touch with us. We look forward to your long and fruitful career association with our organisation. If you decide to join us, 'Welcome to {{ doc.company }} !'

Yours truly,



Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

{% if terms_exist %}
{{ doc.terms }}
{% endif %}
name: Job Offer

html:
{{ doc.company }}
{% if doc.company_address_display %} {% set company_address = doc.company_address_display.replace("\n", " ").replace("
", " ") %} {% if "GSTIN" not in company_address %} {{ company_address }} {{ _("GSTIN") }}:{{ doc.company_gstin }} {% else %} {{ company_address.replace("GSTIN", "
GSTIN") }} {% endif %} {% endif %}
{% if doc.docstatus == 0 %} {{ doc.status + " "+ (doc.select_print_heading or _("Invoice")) }}
{% else %} {{ doc.select_print_heading or _("Invoice") }}
{% endif %}

{{ _("Receipt No") }}: {{ doc.name }}
{{ _("Date") }}: {{ doc.get_formatted("posting_date") }}
{% if doc.grand_total > 50000 %} {% set customer_address = doc.address_display.replace("\n", " ").replace("
", " ") %} {{ _("Customer") }}:
{{ doc.customer_name }}
{{ customer_address }} {% endif %}

{%- for item in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
{{ _("Item") }} {{ _("Qty") }} {{ _("Amount") }}
{{ item.item_code }} {%- if item.item_name != item.item_code -%}
{{ item.item_name }} {%- endif -%} {%- if item.gst_hsn_code -%}
{{ _("HSN/SAC") }}: {{ item.gst_hsn_code }} {%- endif -%} {%- if item.serial_no -%}
{{ _("Serial No") }}: {{ item.serial_no }} {%- endif -%} 		{{ item.qty }}
@ {{ item.rate }}		 {{ item.get_formatted("amount") }}
{% if doc.flags.show_inclusive_tax_in_print %} {% else %} {% endif %} {%- for row in doc.taxes -%} {%- if not row.included_in_print_rate or doc.flags.show_inclusive_tax_in_print -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.discount_amount -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.rounded_total -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.change_amount -%} {%- endif -%}
{{ _("Total Excl. Tax") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("net_total", doc) }} {{ _("Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("total", doc) }}
{{ row.description }} {{ row.get_formatted("tax_amount", doc) }}
{{ _("Discount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("discount_amount") }}
{{ _("Grand Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("grand_total") }}
{{ _("Rounded Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("rounded_total") }}
{{ _("Paid Amount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("paid_amount") }}
{{ _("Change Amount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("change_amount") }}

Tax Breakup:

{{ doc.other_charges_calculation }}

{{ doc.terms or "" }}

{{ _("Thank you, please visit again.") }}
name: GST POS Invoice

html:
Tax Invoice

{{ doc.company or "" }}
{{ frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "registration_details") or "" }} 		Invoice No.
{{ doc.name }} 		Dated
{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.posting_date) }}
Delivery Note
  		Mode/Terms of Payment
 
Supplier's Ref.
  		Other Reference(s)
 
Customer
{{ doc.customer_name or "" }} {{ doc.customer_address or "" }} 		Buyer's Order No.
  		Dated
 
Despatch Document No.
  		Dated
 
Despatched through
  		Destination
 
Terms of Delivery
 
{% for item in doc.items %} {% set remrows = 10 - loop.revindex %} {% set trate = "" %} {% endfor %}
Sl Particulars QTY Rate VAT Amount
{{ loop.index }} {{ item.item_name }} {{ item.get_formatted("qty", 0) }} {{ item.get_formatted("rate", doc) }} Nil {{ item.get_formatted("amount", doc) }}
{{ doc.other_charges_calculation }} TAX Break up {{ doc.tax_breakup }} {% for myrow in doc.item_tax %} {{ myrow.tax_type }} {{ myrow.tax_rate }} {% endfor %} {% for row in doc.taxes %} {{ row.account_head }} {{ row.rate }} {% endfor %}
Amount in Words
{{ doc.in_words }}

{{ doc.base_in_words }} 		SUB TOTAL {{ doc.get_formatted("base_total", doc) }} {{ doc.get_formatted("total", doc) }}
VAT {{ doc.get_formatted("base_total_taxes_and_charges", doc) }} {{ doc.get_formatted("total_taxes_and_charges", doc) }}
TOTAL {{ doc.get_formatted("base_grand_total", doc) }} {{ doc.get_formatted("grand_total", doc) }}
{{ doc.remarks }} for {{ doc.company }}
Authorised Signatory
